title: Biss Meadows Country Park Walking and Cycle Route

images.title: Alan Cooper / Biss Meadows Country Park, Trowbridge
images.caption: Biss Meadows Country Park, Trowbridge. Being floodplain most developers have left this area alone and it has now become a small but pleasant oasis for those living in the new developments around it. That is, if one can ignore the dumped trolleys, carrier bags and other wrapping litter, for immediately behind the photographer is the Tesco's car park with recycling facility.

images.title: Alan Cooper / Biss Meadows Country Park, Trowbridge in high summer
images.caption: Biss Meadows Country Park, Trowbridge in high summer. A summer time view of the Park. The white building on the very left is in fact a large tent erected by Tesco while they expand their store.

images.title: kevin stephens / Biss Meadows Country Park
images.caption: Biss Meadows Country Park

images.title: The River Biss at Trowbridge by M J Richardson, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: The River Biss at Trowbridge

images.title: Rodhullandemu, CC BY 3.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Lake in Trowbridge Park on the River Biss at the northern end of Biss Meadows.

images.title: Ashton Mills from across the River Biss. by M J Richardson, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Ashton Mills from across the River Biss.

description: Enjoy a peaceful riverside walk or cycle along the River Biss in this lovely country park in Trowbridge. The park has a series of nicely laid out paths so makes for a nice traffic free cycle or walk. Biss Meadows is located very near Trowbridge town centre so is easily accessible. There's also a variety of wildlife with herons and Kingfishers visitors to the park. To continue your walking in the town you could try our Trowbridge Park and River Walk and visit the lovely sensory garden just to the north of Biss Meadows. Just to the west is Southwick Country Park which has some good trails to take you around the 100 acre site.

details.subtitle: Dog Walking
details.content: The park is a popular place for dog walkers. You'll probably meet other owners on a fine day.
